title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 3 fun lots of crypto collectibles:LOT 1: BTC CRDZ Opendime kit.Comes with sealed resin BTC Opendime, instruction sheet, usb magnetic cable, and bonus light up resin BTC coinWebsite/company seems to be on hold, but here is their twitter: https://twitter.com/BtcCrdz/mediaBelow is an example picture of what the sealed resin BTC Opendime will look likeLOT 2: CryptoImperator Carbon-Fiber keychain set1x matte / 1x shiny, "B" measures 45mm x 30mm eachLOT 3: BTC wooden mug by Dugout MugsMeasures: 25cm x 6cmLOT 1LOT 2LOT 3STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 27th, 2022, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Edits
comments.body: Lot 3: 0.0006Side question: If I wanted to load lot 1 before giving it to someone, is the public key printed somewhere on the packaging?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Edits on November 26, 2022, 01:12:14 PMSide question: If I wanted to load lot 1 before giving it to someone, is the public key printed somewhere on the packaging?No, not that I can see... but on that note, OpenDimes do not come with a pre-set address.You use entropy when you plug it in to generate the key pair
